item.title: Fluba Hugo
item.description: the static site generator that powers this blog. Learn about my experiences and why I chose Hugo for my journey in tech.

item.title: Diving into Hugo
item.description: Exploring the power and simplicity of Hugo, the static site generator that powers this blog. Learn about my experiences and why I chose Hugo for my journey in tech.

item.title: Foo (art 2)
item.description: My journey with Hugo is just beginning, and I’m excited to explore its more advanced features, such as shortcodes for embedding dynamic content and data- driven pages. For now, I’m incredibly satisfied with its speed, simplicity, and the control it gives me over my blog’s presentation.
